title: [K-12] Online Formative Assessment-Based Mathematics Project Design in Pandemic Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operation skills and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, real-life integrated mathematics education for general citizens

learning_goals: Learners complete smartphone-based formative assessments at a rate of 80% or higher under pandemic conditions
Learners solve three or more real-life problems using mathematical approaches through PBL (Project-Based Learning)
Learners achieve a feedback appropriateness score of 70% or higher through peer assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
